channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The president blamed Joe Biden for selecting Jerome Powell as the U.S. Central Bank head when it was in fact him who made the appointment.

item.title: Fans say new romance bookstores and online groups are giving the genre some overdue respect

item.title: 6/16: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: Israel and Iran trade fire as conflict intensifies; Massive exhumation effort by local police and the FBI in Detroit to solve cold cases

item.title: Tsunami warning issued after 7.2 magnitude earthquake near Alaska
item.description: A major earthquake with a preliminary magnitude of 7.2 has triggered a tsunami warning for the southern Alaska peninsula.

item.title: 6/11: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: Protests against immigration raids spring up across U.S.; Major Garrett talks to those playing in the Congressional Baseball Game.

item.title: WATCH: Hikers confront man accused of starting fire on Los Angeles trail
item.description: A group of hikers stepped in to help stop an alleged arsonist accused of starting a fire in LA's popular Runyon Canyon.

item.title: Trump blasts 'stupid,' 'foolish' Republicans amid calls to reveal more Epstein files
item.description: President Donald Trump continued Wednesday to dismiss calls within his own party for more transparency into the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.

item.title: Texas death row inmate Robert Roberson scheduled to be executed on Oct. 16
item.description: Prosecutors alleged that Roberson killed the child by violently shaking her — a diagnosis commonly referred to at the time as shaken baby syndrome.

item.title: 7.3 magnitude earthquake rattles Alaskan island, prompting tsunami warning
item.description: A 7.3 magnitude earthquake struck near Sand Point, Alaska, on Wednesday, prompting a tsunami warning from the National Weather Service.
